command: What is the longest stretch of days over 90F in [location]?
description: Finds the longest consecutive period where the daily maximum temperature exceeded 90°F in the specified location.

command: What is the longest stretch of days below 30F in [location]?
description: Finds the longest consecutive period where the daily maximum temperature was below 30°F in the specified location.

command: What is the most days over 95F in [location] during a single year?
description: Finds the year with the highest count of days above 95°F in the specified location.

command: What is the most days below 20F in [location] during a single year?
description: Finds the year with the highest count of days below 20°F in the specified location.
Displays all recorded daily maximum temperatures for the specified location.
Displays all recorded daily minimum temperatures for the specified location.

command: List all days above 90 degrees in [location].
description: Lists all dates where the daily maximum temperature exceeded 90°F in the specified location.

command: List all days below 32 degrees in [location].
description: Lists all dates where the daily maximum temperature was below 32°F in the specified location.

command: List all days below minus four in [location].
description: Lists all dates where the daily maximum temperature was below -4°F in the specified location.
Displays all available daily temperature data for the specified location.
Displays drought index data (PDSI) for the specified location.
Displays drought index data (PDSI) for the United States.
Displays historical sunspot count data.
Displays Arctic sea ice extent or area data.
Displays Arctic sea ice data from the OSI (Ocean and Sea Ice) dataset.
Displays the area of Arctic sea ice.
Displays Arctic sea ice data from the NSIDC (National Snow and Ice Data Center) dataset.
Displays Antarctic sea ice extent or area data.
Displays the current or historical stock price for Intel (INTC).
Displays the current or historical stock price for Nvidia (NVDA).

Displays data starting from the year 1990.

Sets the size of points on the graph to 1.5.

Displays 15 horizontal grid lines on the graph.
Sets the lower limit (minimum value) of the graph's Y-axis to 12.
Sets the upper limit (maximum value) of the graph's Y-axis to 22,000.
Displays the annual growth rate of the data.
Displays the difference between two data series.
Displays the data as a bar chart.
Displays the data as a line graph.
Displays the data as a scatter plot.

Removes the trend line from the graph.
Resets the graph's zoom to the default view.
Displays a moving average with a 365-day window.
Displays a moving average with a 12-point window.
Displays the fast Fourier transform (FFT) of the data.
Sets the main title of the chart.
Sets the Y-axis (vertical) title of the chart.

Displays a map relevant to the current data or context.

Displays hurricane data.
